title: HYDERABAD POLO AND RIDING CLUB -  Stick & Ball
text: HYDERABAD POLO AND RIDING CLUB - Stick & Ball +91 – 9177 00 00 56 info@hprc.co.in Member Login Pay Now toggle navigation Home About us Who We Are Mission Vision Values Managing Committee Start Riding About Riding Packages Beginners Riding Programme Intermediate Riding Programme Advanced Riding Programme Polo Equestrian Polo About Polo Stick & Ball Chukkers Events Past Events Upcoming Events SPORTS CENTRE Tennis Badminton Squash Swimming pool Basketball Futsal Gym Sauna Upcoming SportS Event Packages Gold Package Platinum Package RESTAURANTS Chukkers Snaffles Bistro BANQUETS Membership Events & Media Photo Gallery Video Gallery News Events Newsletters Blogs Contact Us Stick & Ball Polo Stick & Ball Stick & Ball Stick and ball sports at HPRC Club encapsulate the elegance and precision of equestrian activities, where riders hone their skills in polo and related disciplines. Our expertly maintained fields provide the ideal backdrop for practicing and competing in these exhilarating sports. Participants engage in drills to refine their technique, aiming for accuracy and agility while riding. Whether learning the basics or striving for mastery, our facilities offer a supportive environment that celebrates the rich traditions and competitive spirit of stick and ball sports. Timings: Morning 6.00am to 10.00am & Evening 4.00pm to 9.00pm Charges: Stick & Ball: 2 Stick ‘n’ Ball Sessions per week x 4 weeks i.e., 8 Sessions per month @ Rs.590/- per Session Rs.4,720/- Stick & Ball Gallery Explore Home About Us Membership Login Start Riding Polo News & Events Contact Us Quick links Apply for Membership Pay Now e-Brochure Past Events Facilities Sport Center Restaurants Banquets Address Near Mrugavani Resort and Spa, Aziz Nagar Village, Gandipet, Ranga Reddy District, Hyderabad, Telangana, India - 500075 reaz@hprc.co.in +91 9177000056 View Location On Map Gallery © 2005 – 2024.
